 " Megatron," Panzertron let a smirk play across his
face," Yes, your infamous activies do procede."


-OOC- The ship is not entirely mobile, she is limited
to deep water areas unless i misunderstood the okay
message the ships ablites were approved. She is no
threat to anyone on land unless ur with in range of
her weapons, cant sail all water bodies( only oceans
no rivers, creaks, puddles etc). Dont be parinod i
aint trying to cause trouble in the game rules. think
about it, all ur bases are way far away from the water.
